sentences.en: A graphical representation of results is shown in figure 1.
sentences.cn: 结果以图表形式呈现在图1中。

sentences.en: A group of students made representations to the college about the poor standard of the accommodation.
sentences.cn: 一群学生就恶劣的住宿条件同校方交涉。

sentences.en: A number representation system with a base of eight.
sentences.cn: 一种以8为基数的数字表示方法.

sentences.en: Binary data that requires two or more bytes for full representation.
sentences.cn: 需要两个或多个字节来完整表示的二进制数据.

sentences.en: Both realism and naturalism are mimetic systems or practices of representation.
sentences.cn: 现实主义和自然主义都是一种模仿体系或表现性的做法。

sentences.en: Different Methods : To touch the keys will result in different representation of timbre.
sentences.cn: 不同的触键方法,会产生不同的音色表现.

sentences.en: Different methods to touch the keys will result in different representation of timbre.
sentences.cn: 不同的触键方法，会产生不同的音色表现。

sentences.en: In this story, the representation of life is hollow.
sentences.cn: 在这个故事中, 对生活的描述是虚伪的.

sentences.en: Minority groups need more effective parliamentary representation.
sentences.cn: 少数族群需要办事更为高效的议会代表。

sentences.en: Puerto Ricans are U.S. citizens but they have no representation in Congress.
sentences.cn: 波多黎各人是美国公民，但是他们在国会中没有代表。

sentences.en: The clock in the painting is a symbolic representation of the passage of time.
sentences.cn: 画上的时钟象征着光阴的流逝。

sentences.en: The general question of size distribution and its representation was briefly discussed.
sentences.cn: 谱分布及其表示法的一般问题已简单地讨论过了.

sentences.en: the negative representation of single mothers in the media
sentences.cn: 媒体对单身母亲的负面描述

sentences.en: The painting is a representation of a storm at sea.
sentences.cn: 这幅画描绘的是海上的暴风雨.

sentences.en: The voltage may provides an analog representation of the temperature difference.
sentences.cn: 电压可以成为温差的模拟表示.

sentences.en: There are many ways of generating a two - dimensional representation of an object.
sentences.cn: 有很多制作物体二维图的方法.

sentences.en: There has been a decline in union representation in the auto industry.
sentences.cn: 汽车行业中工会代表有所减少。

sentences.en: They made a false representation of the whole matter.
sentences.cn: 他们把全部事实作虚假的叙述.

sentences.en: This can better be appreciated by examining the representation in Fig . 6.21.
sentences.cn: 考察图6.21所示的情况,可以更好的了解这一点.

sentences.en: We are especially encouraged by the strong representation, this year, of women in information technology disciplines.
sentences.cn: 今年，女性在信息技术领域的突出表现尤其让我们备受鼓舞。

words.tran_cn: 能被代表的；能上演的；能被描绘的
典型的，有代表性的；代议制的
代表；表现；描绘；回忆；再赠送

phrases.tran_cn: 二进制表示法；二进位表示；二元表示
数字表示，数字表象；[计]数位表示法
绘画作品；图形表示；立体表示法
符号表示；符号表征；符号性表象
视觉再现；可视化表示形式

trans.tran_cn: 表现，陈述，表现…的事物，有代理人
trans.tran_en: a painting, sign, description etc that shows something
